Tunable.name: GRADUATION_DRAMA_NODE
Tunable.description: A reference to the graduation drama node used in code to find the next scheduled graduation event. Please do not tune unless you talk with a GPE first as this should only need to be tuned initially.

Tunable.name: MIN_TIME_REQUIRED_BEFORE_GRADUATION
Tunable.description: The minimum amount of time before a graduation that a Sim must age up to young adult in order to be considered for the current weeks graduation. If the Sim ages up closer to graduation then they will be considered as graduating as the next possible graduation ceremony.
